turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pizza I'd like to order some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, what can I do for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to medium all-meat pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: two meat lovers pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with extra Yes, with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: with extra cheese, got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, let me summarize it for you!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You have 3 minutes left.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 medium meat lovers pizzas with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be 45 dollars an 52 cents.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you very much. Have a great and wonderful day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been sent to Bella Luna and is being prepared. Your order should be ready for pickup soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Oh, thank you. I appreciate that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you! have a great day!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You, too.
